website_summaries.verdict: It looks good, works well, and has space for a serious cigar collection. Once seasoned, it does an excellent job maintaining humidity.
pros: An excellent deal for a lower price
cons: Once seasoned, it takes some time to reach optimal humidity
Lid is not made of real glass

customer_reviews.title: great humidor for the price
customer_reviews.text: great humidor. it holds humidity well. the analog hygrometer is as accurate as a digital. great humidor, even for a high end smoker, this can be used as a dry/ready humidor for your sticks you know will be smoked in the near future so you don't open your other humidor to often - allowing your cigars to age properly. it also can be used as a travel humidor, if you're traveling by car to the beach or skiing. i wouldn't trust it with the airlines.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. The sides of it have all peeled off even though it’s just sat in a corner untouched. The humidistat was broken upon arrival and is worthless, and the whole thing loses humidity so fast it’s not even worth keeping cigars inside.
customer_reviews.author: Pete F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but leaks
customer_reviews.text: Great look, with the cedar, divider and window but it has humidity leak to it. No matter how long, or how much, I try to season it, the humidity doesn't stay past 60 without a lot of additional help. Naturally anything you put in there eats up space for cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Tekki

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to establish humidity inside
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a beautiful box! My husband loved it! Only issue he’s had is maintaining the humidity. We followed the instructions but cannot get it to the optimum humidity level. Could possibly be related to the dry wonder air in our home? Either way it’s solid construction and very nice looking box!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A very good product however
customer_reviews.text: A very good product however, when it arrived, the lighter did not work. I filled the butane and made all the suggested adjustments contained in the pamphlet it came with but I still could not get the lighter to light. And it seems as though I am unable to exchange just the lighter. From what I see, I would have to exchange the whole set which would be a pain because I have already seasoned the humidor and have my sticks stored in it. The humidor itself works great though and I am very pleased with it. I guess I'll just keep the lighter out as a decorative show piece.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great little humidor.
customer_reviews.text: Great little humidor. Holds plenty of cigars and after getting it seasoned it held humidity and temp very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dill Pickle

customer_reviews.title: but it seems like a great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about Humidor's and this is my first one, but it seems like a great product for a great price. After getting it however, I learned a lot more goes into it besides just buying the Humidor. Read up a little and make sure you get everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: Broken Hygrometer
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions exactly and after leaving my hygrometer calibrating over night in a ziploc bag with 1 teaspoon of damp salt in a teaspoon the meter was still reading 55%. So I tried to adjust the reader on the back and it wouldn't stay on 75%. The box is nice, but I received a defective hygrometer. Now I have to buy a digital hygrometer to salvage my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B-Bo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good too!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Looks good too!!! The divider was cracked but still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: KJ in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with humidor, doesn't hold humidity well
customer_reviews.text: Not super thrilled with this humidor. Got hygrometer dialed in according to instructions, followed all directions to season properly. I have about 10 cigars in it and have to leave a shot glass of distilled water in it at all times to remain at 70. The appearance and finish of the box is nice but that's all I can really say about it that's positive.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M.

customer_reviews.title: Will next buy some of the humidity sticks to see if that might help regulate the humidity better. The humidor is nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I'm still a bit of a novice, but after seasoning the humidor, consulting with a cigar shop down the street and following all instructions I can't seem to get the humidity reading to stay at the appropriate level for more than a day or two. Will next buy some of the humidity sticks to see if that might help regulate the humidity better. The humidor is nice looking, but doesn't seem to work easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sopheeeeee14

customer_reviews.title: I got rid of the humidifier it comes with and put in 2 packs of Boveda 72% and it worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This humidor works very well and gets the job done, but the humidifier that comes with it has a problem. It does not provide adequate humidity for 50 cigars as advertised. I got rid of the humidifier it comes with and put in 2 packs of Boveda 72% and it worked like a charm. Other than that, great construction, design and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT hold humidity
customer_reviews.text: My dad needed a new cigar box & I decided to purchase this since it had okay reviews.. Once it was delivered & we tested it out, we found out that you really do need to put a shot glass purified water so it could hold the mositure inside. Without the shot glass the cigars would get crunchy like. The thing he likes about it is the storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for average smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the average person. I orignally had a much larger one and realized I was buying more just to keep it filled. This is a nicely rafted humidor with everything you need and more.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Took this thing to a cigar shop to season it ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this thing to a cigar shop to season it. they did so and it was honestly less costly to throw it away and buy a man humidor.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN SLOYAN

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Has held humidity at 72% to 68% since I have owned it.
customer_reviews.author: He

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to be happy with this product. I have tried everything including following the directions to a tee. I can not get this thing to maintain 70% humidity. I feel like I wasted my money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie and Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for father in law
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and some cigars for my future father in law and he loves it. He knows more about this stuff than I do and he kept commenting on the great quality of the box and tools.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Love this humidor. Seasoned it about a year ago. It’s holding its humidity well - I don’t even have to put any Boveda packs in it and it holds 63-67 throughout the day on my digital. Took a star off because the analog sucks and wouldn’t calibrate easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Pels

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was a steal. Comfortable for 70 sticks. Holds humidity with consistency. Season for a week and a day, then put em in there for a week and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great investment if you buy cigars by the box
customer_reviews.text: Great investment if you buy cigars by the box. I never realized how much fresher my cigars stay with a humidor. Kind of a pain to set up but that seems to be the case with any humidor. Buy it. You can't go wrong for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jmewhort

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had thought this was a terrible purchase it’s not as bad as I thought it doesn’t read right and the top of the glass part is plastic which I was not happy about but for the money it’s not a bad product. You can adjust the hydrometer by popping off the back and moving the hand. Simple to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the inside heat seems to really suck the humidity out of it
customer_reviews.text: works well for the price, the inside heat seems to really suck the humidity out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Archstudent

customer_reviews.title: ... had it for two weeks - So far so good. However I'm not happy about the plastic top
customer_reviews.text: I only had it for two weeks - So far so good. However I'm not happy about the plastic top. Will it maintain the temperature & Humidity - If not Can it be replaced with insulated glass?
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D.

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold moisture
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he can't get it to keep any humidity. He's tried a couple different things and isn't having any luck.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Cigar humidor
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected. Very well built humidor box and bigger than expected. I'd definitely recommend this box for starters
customer_reviews.author: ernesto duran

customer_reviews.title: Nice little humidor
customer_reviews.text: Nice little humidor. Unfortunately I sent it back due to problems with it holding proper humidity. Could have been hygrometer was faulty. Absolutely no problems with the return!
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Leeth

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold humidity.
customer_reviews.text: Despite meticulous seasoning, it wanted to hold 10% lower than I wanted. I could have just gotten a dud, but I expect it’s just poor construction. It was only $25, so I bought it expecting to be disappointed. It will now serve to house my lighter, cutter, bands, etc
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Paid extra for the Lighter and it didn’t come in the box.
customer_reviews.text: The humidors fit and finish is good. But I ordered one for myself and one for a friend. But one came with a torch lighter and the other didn’t... kinda bummed.
customer_reviews.author: sarge

customer_reviews.title: Money well-spent.
customer_reviews.text: Great humidor for the price. Keeps my cigars and pipe tobacco tasting fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Mentalist

customer_reviews.title: For a cigar beginner this box is perfect. My only complaint is maybe add multiple sticky ...
customer_reviews.text: For a cigar beginner this box is perfect. My only complaint is maybe add multiple sticky tape, I lost mine and have to situate my hygrometer in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice humidor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice humidor for the price. I am enjoying my humidor very much. Nice addition to store my cigars in.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Rice

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: plastic top not glass. who cares for 30 bucks?. solid construction. hygrometer exactly 75 after salt test. no calibration needed. seasoning now. great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor for the beginner cigar aficionado
customer_reviews.text: Great humidor for the beginner cigar aficionado. All you need to do is buy a Boveda humidity pack and boom your ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very light weight but still great for the price. makes for a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cova Music

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor - bad hygrometer
customer_reviews.text: Hygrometer did not work well but that was expected, bought a digital one and everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: ... looking for a starter humidor and this one was perfect. It seasoned to 70% in 2 days with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a starter humidor and this one was perfect. It seasoned to 70% in 2 days with just the included humidor disk and a shot glass of water. It has a good seal and with a drymistat tube and the included disk, it will maintain 68-70% with 25-30 cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Boiles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice humidor seasoned well holding humidity at steady 70 percent with brevada pacs not included humidifier
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but sure it will be great - well-made and just the right size
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmom61

customer_reviews.title: You had one job...
customer_reviews.text: Interestingly, this humidor doesn't hold humidity very well. I've seasoned boxes before and used all proper methods; doesn't hold
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo
customer_reviews.text: Great humidor and lighter is even better. Everyone loves the cutter on the bottle, crowd pleaser.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality humidor
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loved this humidor! I bought it for his birthday and he was thrilled. Works great and looks even better!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price with lighter and humidor
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner humidor. The hygrometer on it is mediocre. I bought an caliber4r hygrometer/thermometer to get more accurate. Relative humidity changes based on temps. Bought a xikar humistore and pg solution stays consistent 67-71 at 72* Fahrenheit while in my dark closet. Outside temps have been 90-100 degree F
customer_reviews.author: Ksmooth

customer_reviews.title: Never reached correct temperature
customer_reviews.text: It never got within the correct temperature range. Didn't matter what I did. More water, less water, light, no light... just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: James Mireles

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was extremely well made! This was purchased for my son as a welcome home gift from Afghanistan......very happy with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: S Sprouse

customer_reviews.title: Humidity levels awesome
customer_reviews.text: 70% constant humidity. Used garden water saver crystals with distilled water. Cigars are so soft and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this so far. I've been using it about 3 weeks. Holds humidity well. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: BFlan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: solid humidor, instructions for setting up are straightforward, hygrometer is flush with the front of the box
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: great service
customer_reviews.text: This will be a gift but very pleased with the fast service
customer_reviews.author: Blondannie

customer_reviews.title: Best Humidor Available
customer_reviews.text: This Humidor is phenomenal. I am not the biggest cigar smoker in the world bit this looks elegant, has a great barometer and an amazing seal! I highly recommend this unit to any enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: TLConsultive, L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant seem to get it to hold at 70. Only get it to 58-60%
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had it 4 weeks now and it's w rking perfect
customer_reviews.author: mel saf

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidor
customer_reviews.text: Great first Humidor. Received a case of Cohiba Espendidos and they were severely dry from the trip. This rehumidified them back to their glorious fullness. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty disappointed by my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Tried numerous times to calculate the humidifier to no avail. It continues to gag the humidity %5 over what it should. So far, I'm pretty disappointed by my purchase. I followed all the directions and still no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful humidor I absolutely love it and was really excited when it came in Can't wait to stock it up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is able to keep a really good humidity level, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions on how to keep it humid, and it is not staying humid. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Box.  Inconsistant humidity readings.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box. I do have the hardest time keeping the humidity levels consistent though. The temperature here is quite steady and I always make sure that the humidifier is well maintained. I made sure that the Hygrometer was calibrated right where it needs to be, but unless I leave the shot glass filled with distilled water in it, I can't keep the humidity level above 65%.
customer_reviews.author: John Adam

customer_reviews.title: I've had this humidor for a few weeks now I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this humidor for a few weeks now I've seasoned it a few times still can't get it to stay at the right temperature I think the humidor is faulty
customer_reviews.author: wayne moore

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the money I was pleasantly surprised. The hygrometer was dead on when doing the calibration and using a boveda pack has kept it stable at 72rh for several weeks now. Only complaint was a faint scratch on the plastic window.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Laufer

customer_reviews.title: Great cigar display
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a friend and he loved it. I filled it with his favorite cigars and he displays it with pride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Humidor
customer_reviews.text: Love it perfect size for what it is, I do have to say the hygrometer is some what cheap but other then that very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Am extremely pleased with the value and the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: First truly elegant humidor I've purchased. Am extremely pleased with the value and the quality of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Got everything but the punch cutter that was in my invoice
customer_reviews.author: Albert Harris

customer_reviews.title: It seems to hold a consistent humidity level in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to hold a consistent humidity level in the area needs to. Very cost-effective way to store cigars would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Three Bars Feed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes my husband love it and I do recommend this and the price was fair thanks
customer_reviews.author: lisa washington

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't say anywhere that this item is not returnable. I followed instructions and cant get the humidifier to move. I even used the tool in the back and it didn't work. I'm a prime member and I have never not be able to return an item. I m very disappointed. Total waste of money. I will never order from this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. Gage was only off 1% at 70 so I am happy. Seems to hold a pretty good seal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome. Can't wait to get the cigars in there
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Can't wait to get the cigars in there. Love the gauge on the outside
customer_reviews.author: Max S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product at a great price. For my first humidor it holds the right amount of humidity and a decent amount of cigars
customer_reviews.author: David Geary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice small humidor for home use. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for about 30 cigars depending on size
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for about 30 cigars depending on size. Also if you keep the humidors in there it will definetly keep it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: this is a perfect started humidor for me. I only keep about 20 cigars inside. I did 'treat" the humidor by wetting it before use (against what the directions say). I use a drymist humidistat tub that I purchased on here along with the accessory that came with the unit to keep the humidity between 65-75. Works just fine for me and for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Humidor is great arrived a day early completely satisfied thank you
customer_reviews.author: Allen Afflitto

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, surprisingly inexpensive unit.
customer_reviews.text: I use mine as a travel box, I can take a dozen sticks along on a trip to share and enjoy and not worry about them drying out over a week or so. One suggestion, seal the lid/box seam with blsck electrical tape (easy to unpeel and reuse with no residue). It keeps the lid closed and we'll sealed in transit. I would not recommend for long term storage as the afore mentioned lid/box seal is not very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kittylitter

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking cigar box with a glass lid
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking cigar box with a glass lid, however the humidity gage was broken. I'll still use, just have to purchase a new gage and put it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Fargen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's unbelievable to maintain 70 percent on this, I have to keep a shot glass in.
customer_reviews.author: Lostcause06

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Sturdy! And easy
customer_reviews.text: This is the Mrs. Writing this review and he loves it! He learned how to season it and how to store his cigars. He looked like a kid on Christmas day lol thank you for your affordable prices and help from the Q&A's. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: The Garrisons

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Humidor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice humidor. I would recommend this product along with doing business with them. Quick shipment. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered to me about a week ago. It's awesome. Very pretty. The top is plastic but I don't mind. The guage was about five points off but easily adjusted. I seasoned using a shot glass of distilled water overnight and put two boveda packs inside. This humidor stays right at 70%. I have to check the guage again to make sure it wasn't broken (it isn't). Mine is currently holding about 30 various sized sticks. I could probably get 5-10 more in it. I'm more than happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price! Was shipped very well and came with detailed instructions. This particular one instructed not to be seasoned, but instead uses a shot glass of distilled water in the bottom. I have kept it in there, and along with Xikar solution in the humidifier it has maintained perfect 69-70% humidity. Fits at least 25 cigars easily and the divided works great. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: missing a piece for to keep the cigars good. Dont have time to return its a Christmas party gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this box for the hygrometer and I'm very disappointed. I followed the instructions and allowed the box ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this box for the hygrometer and I'm very disappointed. I followed the instructions and allowed the box to sit for several days for 6 hours for the hygrometer to calibrate. It's been over almost a month and it's still reading 49%. It's suppose to read between 70/80%!! Now I will have to purchase another hygrometer to ensure that my cigars are getting the proper humidity 😠☹️😠☹️!!
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one of these for my husband and one for his dad for Christmas. They loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and works great. It was already calibrated when I received it. I threw some gel beads in there and the humidity is staying nice and constant. It's a large humidor so if youre just starting your collection it's going to look a bit bare, so more motivation to keep it stocked up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Roksalt

customer_reviews.title: Stay clear of this one
customer_reviews.text: Humidor looks alright, but it will not season properly and the hygrometer is garbage. I would like to return it but the seller doesn't accept returns, so now i'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love it. Looks beautiful on his desk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift . They love it. Looks beautiful on his desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: By no means is it a superior high quality humidor
customer_reviews.text: The top isn't glass. For the price, you really can't go wrong with it. By no means is it a superior high quality humidor. I needed something quick until I found the one I really like, and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: The Don

customer_reviews.title: Good Humidor But Came With Defect
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice humidor but there was a major blemish on the wood grain. I notified the seller and never heard back. It works fine but was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert DeMarzo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set up and need extra parts. People who are not experienced with cigars should beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this humidor a ZERO STAR review ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this humidor a ZERO STAR review I would. It completely dried and ruined a all of my cigars.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice humidor but came with a nick on the front
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice humidor but came with a nick on the front. I had a small plaque added to the front for my dad which covered it but if I hadn't planned to do that I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great for a newbie!
customer_reviews.text: The humidor cam in exactly as advertised. Was farily easy to setup. I did read the reviews and thank you everyone for the seasoning advice. It did take longer than I expected (I am new) to get it seasoned to where the humidity would hold but after patience and a shot glass of water this thing operates like a champ. Humidity is holding steady and the box looks very nice. This is an easy and excellent box for someone who is just getting into cigar storage.
customer_reviews.author: Streakster

customer_reviews.title: Great little humidor
customer_reviews.text: This humidor is a great little starter one. I'm not a cigar officianado by any means but it keeps the several that I do own in great condition. If you're just a casual cigar smoker or just getting started, I highly recommend this one. I will note that I use a shot glass with a small bit of paper towel coming out the top inside to keep the humidity at 70%. I find this works really well at keeping it even. The black "puck" that comes with it works ok (it may be a function of my lack of knowledge) . I do find at certain times of the year I need to use both sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Smokechaser

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor
customer_reviews.text: This humidor took longer than I expexted to get it up to the right humidity. But, once it was, I didnt have any problems keeping it there. Its a great place to store your cigars and keep them as fresh as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Nice box for the occasional smoker
customer_reviews.text: This works great for the price. I would just say get a digital hygrometer and you will be all set. I'm a once a weekend smoker and this keeps everything at a good humidity. It was easy to get started, there are a lot of how-to sites online that will walk you through the setup.
customer_reviews.author: Sirslackalot

customer_reviews.title: Hygrometer sucks, stays at 60
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this yesterday and I've tried 2 different calibration methods and tried to manually adjust the calibration and it stays at 60 no matter what. I can't vouch for the consistency of the humidor yet but make sure you have a digital hygrometer to save yourself time and stress UPDATE: Season the humidor with distilled for a few days. The humidor is very dry and won't hold anything until seasoned that way
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Young

customer_reviews.title: It wont fit 50 cigars!
customer_reviews.text: Fits 25 cigars? Yes. If you try to put even close to 50? No way. Its a good standard humidor with a average hydrometer. So, it has a plastic see thru top. It doesnt matter if its glass or plastic. I can see the contents, and it doesn't affect my cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Co.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Hygrometer, humidor doesn't hold humidity well, the top windows is plastic. I'd invest a little bit more money into getting a higher quality humidor.
customer_reviews.author: WhatItIs

customer_reviews.title: Looks way more expensive than it is!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend who has recently gotten into cigars. I was hesitant to buy one of these on Amazon, thinking that it wouldn't be as nice as one from a cigar store. I was wrong! This box is beautiful! And it was literally a fraction of the price the cigar store was charging. I am super happy with my purchase and so is my boyfriend!
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaMarieBeauty

product_meta.title: Scorch Torch 25-50 Cigar Humidor Humidifier w/Hygrometer
product_meta.description: Every great cigar needs the perfect resting ground, and for any smoker, the freshness and flavor of a cigar is vital. Treat your cigars with care and preserve them with Scorch Torch’s premium line of Cigar Humidors. Designed to ensure the prestige and quality of a great smoke, our Cigar Humidors are made from a handsome wood for a warm and woodsy feel. With the right humidor, your cigars will retain their freshness indefinitely. The perfect resting place for your smokes at home, on-the-go, or in the office, our competitively priced humidor products are perfect for seasoned aficionados and cigar newcomers alike. Treat your cigars with the care and protection they deserve with Scorch Torch’s Cigar Humidors to achieve the perfect seal of optimal moisture control and distribution.
feature_bullets: 1 - Scorch Torch Fitzgerald Cigar Humidor Box
Size: Exterior - 8.75" x 10" x 4.25" / Interior - 9.5" x 8" x 2.5" / Humidifier – 2.25” x .5”
Color: Cherry / Fits 18-25 Cigars Horizontally and 50-73 Cigars Vertically
Package Includes: 1 - Humidor / 1 - Velcro Tape / 1 – Cedar Divider / 1 – Instruction Manual
